summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.9°C) and outside temperature (down 3.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8036 lux) and cloud levels (up 285 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15488 lux), cloud levels (up 1749 m), feels like temperature (up 6.7°C), and outside temperature (up 5.5°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 981.1m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, pleasant humidity levels. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dark. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
